summary: Expense tracker app with monthly, yearly, and multi-yearly views. Now adding expandable details tables for each time period to show all daily expenses inline.
architectural_notes: App uses two canisters: backend (stores expense data) and frontend (serves website)
Expense data stored in canister stable memory on Internet Computer
Data persists unless canister runs out of cycles or data is manually deleted

existing_features.title: Add a 'Details' button below the monthly summary section that, when clicked, expands inline to display a table of all daily expenses for the current month to date
Add a 'Details' button below the yearly summary section that, when clicked, expands inline to display a table of all daily expenses for the current year to date
Add a 'Details' button below the multi-yearly summary section that, when clicked, expands inline to display a table of all daily expenses across all years
Ensure each time period's details section can be expanded and collapsed independently without affecting the other sections

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Details button below monthly, yearly, and multi-yearly summaries that expands inline to show table of all daily expenses
Create a backend query method to fetch all expenses within a specified date range to support the monthly and yearly detail views
